languages.text: "Если Эксплораторы докажут, что Горнило имеет статус археотеха, а не святыни, они могут его забрать под опеку".
"If the Explorators can prove that the Crucible is an archeotech mechanism and not a relic, then they may become its curators."
languages.original_text: "Если Эксплораторы докажут, что Горнило имеет статус археотеха, а не святыни, они могут его забрать под опеку".

traits.locale_text: "It the Explorators will prove that the Crucible is a archeotech and not a relic, then they can take it for themselves."

languages.text: “如果开拓者能证明熔炉是远古科技装置，而不是圣物，那么他们就可以合法拥有熔炉。”
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators can prove that the Crucible is an archeotech mechanism and not a relic, then they can be its curators."

traits.locale_text: “如果开拓者能证明熔炉是远古科技装置，而不是圣物，那么他们就可以合法拥有熔炉。”

languages.text: «Si los Exploradores pueden demostrar que el Crisol es un mecanismo arqueotecnológico y no una reliquia, podrán ser sus custodios».
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators can prove that the Crucible is an archeotech mechanism and not a relic, then they can be its curators."

traits.locale_text: «Si los Exploradores pueden demostrar que el Crisol es un mecanismo arqueotecnológico y no una reliquia, podrán ser sus custodios».

languages.text: 「エクスプロレイターは、坩堝が技術遺産のメカニズムであり、聖遺物ではないことを証明できれば、彼らはその管理者になれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators can prove that the Crucible is an archeotech mechanism and not a relic, then they can be its curators."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスプロレイターは、坩堝が技術遺産のメカニズムであり、聖遺物ではないことを証明できれば、彼らはその管理者になれるだろう」

languages.text: « Si les Explorators peuvent prouver que le Creuset est un mécanisme archéotechnologique et non une relique, ils pourront en conserver la garde. »
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators can prove that the Crucible is an archeotech mechanism and not a relic, then they can be its curators."

traits.locale_text: « Si les Explorators peuvent prouver que le Creuset est un mécanisme archéotechnologique et non une relique, ils pourront en conserver la garde. »

languages.text: "Wenn die Exploratoren beweisen können, dass der Tiegel ein Archäotech-Mechanismus und keine Reliquie ist, dann gehört er ihnen."
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators can prove that the Crucible is an archeotech mechanism and not a relic, then they can be its curators."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Exploratoren beweisen können, dass der Tiegel ein Archäotech-Mechanismus und keine Reliquie ist, dann gehört er ihnen."

languages.text: "Keşiftörler, Pota'nın bir yadigâr değil de bir arkeotek mekanizması olduğunu kanıtlayabilirlerse sorumluluğunu üstlenebilirler."
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators can prove that the Crucible is an archeotech mechanism and not a relic, then they can be its curators."
